author: Brian Matthews
comment: Thank you for the free app sale!

author: ProXboxCraft PXC
comment: Concept is great, but the time text is out of place on my Asus ZenWatch 2. Please fix.

reply.author: Warp X
reply.content: Hi, a fix is incoming! Thanks for the feedback. Edit: an update fixing this issue is live, thanks.

author: Savio George
comment: Updated: The Dev team are awesome! Fixed the alignment issue as soon as I wrote to them. Well done guys thumbs up! Definely recommend them. ------- Old : Does not work with Sony Smartwatch 3 ( Square Dial )

author: Thomas Jeffers
comment: Great concept but font does not line up on Moto 360 2nd gen. Dev was very quick to respond and is working on it

reply.author: Warp X
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback! Updated with a fix, let me know if it looks OK now.

author: Eric Maciejewski
comment: Super cool app...works great. Love looking at my watch and seeing a retro NES graphic :)
title: Throw back!!

comment: Text doesn't align with the graphics. Little customisation.
